name: mikeleffel2
text: I'd just like to see the results of Phillepe's speed/weight vs. those pop bottles.

name: dipstikk
text: That avatar is exactly what I look like.

name: greenkoolayd
text: actually, they are soda bottles. dont worry, though, its a common mistake.

name: petitegitan
text: A comment left by petitegitan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Belgand, king_of_pwns, mrpedro, perhapsmaybe, goodgravy)

name: homeskool
text:
I saw this comment has 10 chubbies, and shook my head and thought to myself "She only has chubbies cause she has a vagina."

I then promptly punched myself in the face.

name: rainwolfj
text: Dude, vaginas get mad chubbies, and I mean that both ways... like a bi-sexual.

name: weretrout
text: Yeah, thanks Ted.

name: ntopp
text: Likewise.

name: shoinan
text: This would work on my girlfriend too and would make me laugh nearly as much.

name: starch
text: Is your girlfriend 5? Because that is illegal.

name: pigs
text: If 15 will get you 20, what will 5 get you?

name: dismas
text: 'cause SEVEN EIGHT NINE

name: waddlerz
text: probably get you murdered in prison

name: kilroywashere
text: Lyle is always riding that line between "aw, how cute, he's the 'mean' character of the group" and "hey, I'm going to punch Philippe in the stomach for Christmas". This strip is a really good example of that.

name: darkwaffle
text: I love how Lyle doesn't even care that the little otter is just a little otter.

name: stuart
text: Once you take the size of these characters into account you realize that's a really narrow hallway.

name: rowboat
text: The Onstads have to side shimmy to get to the pisser.

name: pitseleh
text: Tricking Philippe with the prospect of going to Hogwarts for his own amusement...for shame, Lyle. For shame.

name: mikebox
text: ohhhh, Harry Potter. I am lame for not getting it until I saw this comment, and I understand that.

name: achilleselbow
text: A comment left by achilleselbow was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by love_is_so_punk, sirhan_duran, beansdooma, Diggidy, Vondicus, Mangtastic, Deusoma, jfenserty, Avery86, TonyHighwind, Ebessan, stop, MortisInvictus, DougTheHead, Lumus, jaypage, endstate, Boyd, charchar, unsentletter, Lapsarian)

name: diggidy
text: Your words cut me like Gryffindor's sword through the mouth of the basilisk.

name: heccibiggs
text:
I see that in the past I already chubbied this comment. Good.. Good...

achilleselbow you know I love you but Harry Potter is fly and your disagreement with enjoying Harry Potter is not fly.

name: audry
text: my origional reaction to this was "wait! that's not the way into malcovich's head!" and then i got it.

name: jackparsons
text: It is a testament to Onstad that I have loved this strip through several readings, and only now get the joke.

name: tttt2
text:
you loved a strip with a punchline that you didn't get

that's a testament to something

name: lrosetw8
text: I noticed the second time I read this Teodor's silent plea for Lyle to not do this thing (Panel 4).

name: dak
text: I think Teodor is just shocked and realizing he's about to get bowled over too.

name: unsentletter
text: That's my favorite part -- Teodor's "yii!" palms-up realization/reaction. It's perfect. Shit is about to go down .

name: deusoma
text: Just out of curiosity, did anyone not give this strip a 5?

name: zoom
text: considering it ranks 4.4...maybe.

name: cailetshadow
text: A comment left by cailetshadow was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by osakimandias, orvel, Vreeeee)

name: dj_insomniac
text: A chubby for the xkcd reference, my friend.

name: deusoma
text: I was implying that, on the face of God's Green Earth, there is nothing more perfect than this specific Achewood Strip.

name: relaxing
text: The alt text lets us know Onstad is still sticking to the basic conceit of the stuffed animals living in his home.

name: drago25
text: Lyle is my favourite drunk mad-scientist, er tiger

name: heccibiggs
text: Ahh hahaha oh no. I'm so glad we weren't shown the conclusion of this, it would be far too tragic.

name: spinynorman
text:
Philippe has already handled Teodor's fleshlight, his life really can't get any more tragic

(I've been reading the blog archives. That actually happened.)

name: mrectomy
text: One of the few achewood strips that I had to think about for second before I got the joke.

name: rodjmeister
text: this is epic.

name: ham_shoes
text: Greek Greek Greek

name: carlyle
text: No doorways to duck into, the halls too long to run back... Teodor, wall climb!

name: razorman57
text: this is my new favorite thing ever. I just know the next strip would be phillippe running as fast as he can, then having cornelius yell at lyle.
